metadata.title: Epidemiologic and Clinical Characteristics of 91 Hospitalized Patients with COVID-19 in Zhejiang, China: A retrospective, multi-centre case series

sentences.segment_text: Retrospective case series .
Methods

abstract.original_text: were admitted to five hospitals in Zhejiang province, China. Data were

sentences.segment_text: were admitted to five hospitals in Zhejiang province , China .
Data were

abstract.original_text: Of all 91 patients, 88 (96.70%) were laboratory-confirmed COVID-19 with throat swab samples that tested positive for SARS-Cov-2 while 3 (3.30%)

sentences.segment_text: Of all 91 patients , 88 ( 96.70 % ) were laboratory-confirmed COVID-19 with throat swab samples that tested positive for SARS-Cov-2 while 3 ( 3.30 % )

abstract.original_text: were clinical-diagnosed COVID-19 cases. The median age of the patients was 50 (36.5-57) years, and female accounted for 59.34%. In this sample 40 (43.96%) patients had contracted the diseases from local cases, 31 (34.07%) patients had been to Wuhan/Hubei, 8 (8.79%) cases had contacted with people from Wuhan, 11 (12.09%) cases were confirmed aircraft transmission.

sentences.segment_text: were clinical-diagnosed COVID-19 cases .
The median age of the patients was 50 ( 36.5-57 ) years ,
and female accounted for 59.34 % .
In this sample 40 ( 43.96 % ) patients had contracted the diseases from local cases ,
31 ( 34.07 % ) patients had been to Wuhan/Hubei ,
8 ( 8.79 % ) cases had contacted with people from Wuhan ,
11 ( 12.09 % ) cases were confirmed aircraft transmission .

abstract.original_text: In particular within the city of Ningbo, 60.52% cases can be traced back to an event held in a temple. The most common symptoms were fever (71.43%), cough (60.44%) and fatigue (43.96%). The median of incubation period was 6 (IQR, 3-8) days and the median time from first visit to a doctor to confirmed diagnosis was 1 (1-2) days. According to the Chest computed tomography scans, 67.03% cases had bilateral pneumonia.

sentences.segment_text: In particular within the city of Ningbo ,
60.52 % cases can be traced back to an event held in a temple .
The most common symptoms were fever ( 71.43 % ) ,
cough ( 60.44 % ) and fatigue ( 43.96 % ) .
The median of incubation period was 6 ( IQR , 3-8 ) days and the median time from first visit to a doctor to confirmed diagnosis was 1 ( 1-2 ) days .
According to the Chest computed tomography scans ,
67.03 % cases had bilateral pneumonia .
